title: Aeon Cyber Watch Face
summary: The ages bend and wane to bring the Aeon here.
description: The future is divine.  The great advents of the galaxy unite to form a greater being within the galaxy.  Photonic crystals were developed with the capacity to shape life itself.  These crystals were the first objects to be sent back in time to the pregenitors in the year 2015 ACE.  One can only dream of what they will do with the power to change reality and the timeline.This watch face tells the time in 12 hour and 24 hour modes.There are multiple colors to choose from; each representing a different advent.The watch face tells the date on your smartwatch in MM/DD/YYYY formatThe watch face shows you your watch battery levelThis watch face will work with most android wear devices, and was tested on the Moto 360 and Sony SmartWatch 3Once downloaded, this watch face will be accessible in Android Wear.  You may download Android Wear from Google Play to sync your watch to your phone.  If the watch face does not appear,  you can go to Settings > Resync apps in android wear.  After a few minutes you may also check to see if the app has already been installed on your smartwatch.Disclaimer:  This watch face does not shoot particle beams or remove people from the time line.
descriptionHTML:
The future is divine. The great advents of the galaxy unite to form a greater being within the galaxy. Photonic crystals were developed with the capacity to shape life itself. These crystals were the first objects to be sent back in time to the pregenitors in the year 2015 ACE. One can only dream of what they will do with the power to change reality and the timeline.

This watch face tells the time in 12 hour and 24 hour modes.
There are multiple colors to choose from; each representing a different advent.
The watch face tells the date on your smartwatch in MM/DD/YYYY format
The watch face shows you your watch battery level

This watch face will work with most android wear devices, and was tested on the Moto 360 and Sony SmartWatch 3

Once downloaded, this watch face will be accessible in Android Wear. You may download Android Wear from Google Play to sync your watch to your phone. If the watch face does not appear, you can go to Settings > Resync apps in android wear. After a few minutes you may also check to see if the app has already been installed on your smartwatch.

Disclaimer: This watch face does not shoot particle beams or remove people from the time line.
